room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Ninja Escape in Seattle
review: This was our 9th escape room but first with a zombie! Hands down the best one so far! Intern Ben was so energetic and fun which made the experience one of a kind. Thom the zombie was great and added just the right amount of adrenaline to make this more thrilling than any other. Definitely recommending and coming back for the other room

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Ninja Escape in Seattle
review: This was my first time in an escape room. We had a lot of fun. It definitely forced you to get out of your comfort zone to learn how to work with complete strangers to solve puzzles. The zombie gave it a fun fear factor and adrenaline rush. Rose and Duff were our escape room guides. They provided guidance and an element of fun to the whole experience. I can't wait to try this again!

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Ninja Escape in Seattle
review: We went as a group for birthday shenanigans and it was such a fun experience! We didn't know what to expect since it was our first time. The actors did awesome!

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Ninja Escape in Seattle
review: The most fun I have had in a very long time. I highly recommend it to everybody. The zombie and the professor were both spectacular

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Ninja Escape in Seattle
review: We had an amazing time! The actor really made the experience, they did a wonderful job!
